betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oThis can be used to bypass the inventory reset in Vethea.

§fA broken pact. A cheat. A way out!
No rule can be fully binding and foolproof. Not even the rule of Recursion.
That is the forbidden knwoledge the Lurker has discovered.
If I were to use it, I could forego the initial sacrifice. Not the whole thing, but the burden would be lightened.
betterquesting:10.name:8: The Pact of the Secret Lurker
